content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the price, shall we? What is your budget for renting a place like this?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student so I don't have a big budget. I can offer 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than what I was expecting. The location of the apartment and its amenities justify a higher price. How about 800 euros per month? That's a fair price considering the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 800 euros is too high for me. I can offer 600 euros per month. I am smart and responsible, and I'm sure I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 euros is still below my expectations. I need a tenant who can appreciate the quality of this apartment and is willing to pay a fair price. Let's meet in the middle at 700 euros per month. That's a reasonable compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for meeting me in the middle. I agree to the price of 700 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. I agree to the price of 700 euros per month. Please let me know if you need more time to consider the lease terms, or if you're ready to proceed with the paperwork.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, I agree to the price of 700 euros per month and I'm ready to proceed with the paperwork.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! Let's move forward with the lease agreement. I'll have my lawyer prepare the documents and we can meet to sign them. Once the paperwork is done, you'll be the proud tenant of a beautiful apartment in the heart of Munich. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay! Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we conclude our negotiation?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
No, I don't have anything else to discuss. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment and I appreciate your help throughout the negotiation process.

[response]
Thank you, Maryam. I'm glad we could come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. I'm sure you'll find my apartment a great place to live, and I'm excited to have you as a tenant. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me. Have a great day!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving in and making your apartment my new home. Is there anything else I need to know before we sign the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
